name: bexer-astro
title: Bexer Astro
desc: Bexer Astro - A sleek, responsive theme with diverse pages, ideal for SaaS, startups, and agencies seeking to enhance their digital footprint.
article:
Key feature :

  • Google PageSpeed Score 98/100 (Desktop)
  • Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • 20+ Unique Pages
  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  • Netlify & Vercel Configured
  • Google Map integrated
  • Multilingual Feature
  • Search Feature
  • Taxonomy support
  • Contact form support
  • Disqus Comments available
  • Support OG image
  • Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • SEO Friendly
  • Clean folder structure
  • Simple and easy development environment setup
  • Free Update and Lifetime Premium Support
  • Detail Documentation.

Special Features :

  1. Multilingual Feature
  2. Search Feature
  3. Embedded Google Map



Pages :

  1. Homepage
  2. About
  3. Services List
  4. Services Single
  5. Blog List
  6. Blog Single
  7. Authors List
  8. Authors Single
  9. Category List
  10. Category Single
  11. Tags List
  12. Tags Single
  13. Team List
  14. Team Single
  15. Contact Us
  16. Projects List
  17. Projects Single
  18. Terms & Conditions
  19. Privacy Policy
  20. Elements
  21. 404 Page
